channel.title: HackTheBox on Gabriele Abbate
channel.description: Recent content in HackTheBox on Gabriele Abbate

item.title: Perfection
item.description: After trying some code injection I noticed that I could bypass the input sanification by going one line down (adding %0a) category1=A%0a The server is written in Ruby, we can try to inject some Embedded Ruby (ERB). <%= File.read("/etc/passwd") %> Encoding the payload and injecting it gives us the expected result I read the name susan in the list of users, so I try to read the user flag in /home/susan/user.
